author: sagara
msg: After fixing AXIS2-5374 it is mandatory to send "SOAPAction" header when sending a SOAP 1.1 message ( "text.xml") .

author: ard
msg: RAVE-697 rename AbstractFragmentsRemoverEnhancer to FragmentsThatAreAbstractRemoverEnhancer as the former one makes one thing the class is abstract

author: ate
msg: - adding qualified support for non-nested dynamically routed handlers, e.g. like rest services (see DynWidgetApi example)
Note: only route targets starting with a / now are expected and resolved as (nested) root page fragments
- expose a HandlerContext, or NestedHandlerContext as injectable method arguments
- support *reverse* routing for routed or nested handlers using a RoutePathMapping, exposed through the HandlerContext
(temporarily 'hacked' and used in the PageHeaderController to create the admin link, now pointing to a  DynWidgetApi method action instead)
